Articles.Content: So long story short, I want to make a day in KSP 24hours (which I believe it was before). However, now it's 6. Now to combat this, I've used Hyper edit to change kerbin's rotation period, and I have KAS which allows me to keep a neat earth based calendar. However, in game, if I were to say, mouse over my apoapsis to see how many days it will be before I reach it, it gives me a number based off of the 6 hour day rather than the 24 hour one. If anyone knows if someone has found out to alter this, or can alter this themselves, I'd much appreciate it

There is a setting somewhere for that in the options screen. I don't know where offhand.

You could also edit your SETTINGS.CFG file (in the same directory as ksp.exe) and change KERBIN_TIME = True to KERBIN_TIME = False
